snippet: The Renova Group of Russia has helped save Fort Ross State Historic Park from closing, and similar public-private partnerships are in the works across California.
lead_paragraph: The Renova Group of Russia has helped save Fort Ross State Historic Park from closing, and similar public-private partnerships are in the works across California.

headline.main: Russians Come to the Rescue of Sonoma’s Fort Ross Park
headline.seo: Fort Ross Park Saved From Closing by Renova Group of Russia
headline.print_headline: Russians Come to the Rescue Of Sonoma’s Fort Ross Park
